description: This course introduces basic techniques for performance on all instruments of the percussion family, with an emphasis on the snare drum. Additional topics include: pedagogical techniques, tools, and literature; teaching repertoire; and instrument care. Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the spring semester.
name: Percussion Methods
prerequisites: Prerequisite: permission of instructor required for students not majoring in theory/composition or music education. Offered annually in the spring semester.
